items.title: How to Automate Simple Tasks with Node.js
items.text: Then I wrote a small program that read the data source file, parsed the numbers on a new line as a separated value to be added, and did the summing up.

items.title: How to Automate Simple Tasks with Node.js
items.text: Don't get me wrong, I am aware there are a lot of other ways to do such calculations. But since I would like to call myself a programmer who loves to automate stuff, I wanted to do it myself. In the old school way.
